titles.title: Dismissing the election contest against Loretta Sanchez.

action.text: The House Committee on House Oversight reported an original measure, H. Rept. 105-416, by Mr. Thomas.
Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 145.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
Mr. Hoyer moved to recommit with instructions to House Oversight.
The previous question was ordered without objection.
On motion to recommit with instructions Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 194 - 215 (Roll no. 15).
On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 378 - 33 (Roll no. 16).
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 02/11/1998--Introduced. Dismisses the election contest against Loretta Sanchez.
